subject: Id. Order no. 3054444709830540
description_text:
Hello...I am contacting you regarding my order 3054444709830540.

The brake signal remains constantly on even when it's not being touched.

As I also specified on the Aliexpress chat, I would need a new load cell.
I'll try to attach a video....the signal is always there, even if it's not touched....but if I put, for example, the clutch pedal in place of the brake, everything works...so the control unit is fine and it's just the brake's load cell that is damaged.
I was asking in the Aliexpress chat how to get it as soon as possible? Because a championship I have already signed up for is about to start and I need the load cell as soon as possible.
I await news from you.
I'll try to attach a video.
Kind regards


Sent from my Galaxy

conversations.body_text: Hi salvatore benintende,  You can test and restore using Freejoy 1.7.0. If it is version 1.7.1, you can update the pedal firmware in Simsonn Manager via Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update → Pedals → firmware → pedals-plus.sfu.      https://www.simsonn.com/pages/download
Ticket ID 9754 has been merged into this ticket.

Merged from ticket 9754
      Subject: id order 3054444709830540
      Description:


 Attaching a better video







 Sent from my Galaxy

Hello, I'll try it and let you know



Sent from my Galaxy



-------- Original Message --------
From: service @simsonn.com
Data: 02/01/26 04:27 (GMT+01:00)
To: saffo_rok @hotmail.it
Subject: Re: Id. Order n. 3054444709830540

Hi salvatore benintende,

You can test and restore using Freejoy 1.7.0. If it is version 1.7.1, you can update the pedal firmware in Simsonn Manager via Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update → Pedals → firmware → pedals-plus.sfu.

https://www.simsonn.com/pages/download


On Fri, 2 Jan at 4:31 AM , salvatore benintende <saffo_rok @hotmail.it> wrote:
Hello...I'm contacting you about my order 3054444709830540.

the brake signal is constantly present even when not touched.

As I also specified on the Aliexpress chat, I would need a new load cell.
I'll try to attach a video....the signal is always there, even if you don't touch it....but if I put for example the clutch pedal instead of the brake, everything works...so the control unit is fine and it's just the brake's load cell that is damaged.
I was asking in the Aliexpress chat how to get it as soon as possible? Because a championship for which I have already registered is about to start and I need the load cell as soon as possible.
I await your news.
I'll try to attach a video.
Kind regards


Sent from my Galaxy

Hi salvatore benintende,  I can see that the pedals are working normally in SIMSONN Manager. You can set the brake deadzone to 5% to resolve the brake signal output issue. Additionally, please recalibrate the pedals.

Listen me...I have calibrate pedals 2000 times...in this moment(when I made the photo) I am don't touching the pedal.In the Aliexpress chat I wrote that I don't want the load cell free or in warranty,but I can pay naturally...but I NEED A NEW LOAD CELL!!! You are making many problems for 13€ of product.It's the second time that I have problems with load cell and It's giving me same problems of the first.
Say me something.
Regards
